summary: This is my first mod I made for Skyrim and I am pretty proud of myself. It is a new home that is found in Solitude in a secret trap door. The house is pretty big, it has 2 ench tables, and 2 Alchs too, Throne room, Player library(a room with rows of bookshelves), Sleeping area is in a trapdoor next to the throne room. And more
descriptionHtml: This is my first mod I made for Skyrim and I am pretty proud of myself. It is a new home that is found in Solitude. There is a Trap door type of thing right next to the training dummies area by the barracks. (The Melee ones, not the ranged.) Then it leads to the home after going through another door. The house is pretty big, it has 2 ench tables, and 2 Alchs too, Throne room, Player library(a room with rows of bookshelves), Sleeping area is in a trapdoor next to the throne room, then theres a dining room with cookpots and 2 cooking spits, A private study area with Ench table, Alch table, table with books, and also another Copy of \"Ohgma Infinium.\" Theres also 2 suprise chests next to the ench table, and also a suprise in the wardrobe. There is also 3 training rooms full of p.dummies specialized for each attack type (Magic,Melee,Range). Then after a long day of trecking throughout skyrim you can go into the tranquil forest room with some flowers and a Nirnroot just for the music it provides. So Peaceful :)    I hope you guys like the mod, please give comments. thankyou
author: Malun327
